alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia; Franklin; Madison; Richland; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 16 at 4:19AM CDT until June 16 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 314 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 PARISHES IN NORTHEAST LOUISIANA CATAHOULA CONCORDIA FRANKLIN MADISON RICHLAND TENSAS IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 20 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI COPIAH HINDS RANKIN SIMPSON SMITH IN EAST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI CLARKE JASPER IN SOUTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI JEFFERSON DAVIS LAWRENCE LINCOLN MARION IN SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI COVINGTON FORREST JONES LAMAR IN SOUTHWEST MISSISSIPPI ADAMS CLAIBORNE FRANKLIN JEFFERSON IN WEST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI WARREN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF BASSFIELD, BAY SPRINGS, BRANDON, BROOKHAVEN, BUDE, COLLINS, COLUMBIA, CRYSTAL SPRINGS, DELHI, FAYETTE, FERRIDAY, HARRISONBURG, HATTIESBURG, HAZLEHURST, HEIDELBERG, JACKSON, JONESVILLE, LAUREL, LUMBERTON, MAGEE, MEADVILLE, MENDENHALL, MONTICELLO, MOUNT OLIVE, NATCHEZ, NEW HEBRON, NEWELLTON, PEARL, PORT GIBSON, PRENTISS, PURVIS, QUITMAN, RALEIGH, RAYVILLE, RICHLAND, ROXIE, SHUBUTA, ST. JOSEPH, STONEWALL, TALLULAH, TAYLORSVILLE, VICKSBURG, VIDALIA, WATERPROOF, WESSON, WEST FERRIDAY, WEST HATTIESBURG, AND WINNSBORO.
